trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关的设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>可视设计器中的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类文档。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Returns ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that represents the profile service properties defined in a Web page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control and <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示在网页中定义的配置文件服务属性的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控件和<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control associated with the Web Page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> Web 页关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls associated with the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"> </xref> Web 页关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript code that defines the profile service properties.
trans-unit.target: 定义配置文件服务属性的 JavaScript 代码。

trans-unit.source: scriptManager is .
trans-unit.target: scriptManageris .

trans-unit.source: Returns the HTML markup that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示返回 HTML 标记<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控件在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the generated HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可以更改已生成的 HTML<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件在设计时。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用于呈现的标记<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Provides a proxy script from a derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供了来自派生的代理脚本<xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref>页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> control that is used to register a Web service for use in the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"> </xref>用于在页中注册 Web 服务以供使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: The proxy script.
trans-unit.target: 代理服务器脚本中。

trans-unit.source: Provides a proxy URL from a derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供来自派生的代理 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref>页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> control that is used to register a Web service for use in the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"> </xref>用于在页中注册 Web 服务以供使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: A proxy URL.
trans-unit.target: 代理 URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is defined by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回由定义的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref>属性。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains the resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含资源的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the resource in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在程序集资源的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The culture that the resource is specified for.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的资源的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript resource.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript 资源中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> controls that are defined in a Web page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control and <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 返回的所有集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> Web 页中定义的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref>控件和<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection that is returned includes framework scripts that are sent automatically to the client to support AJAX functionality such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> and <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合包括都会自动发送到客户端以支持 AJAX 功能，例如 framework 脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>和<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: When you use the GetScriptReferences method, be aware of the following guidelines: - Script references with the same <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties are removed as duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 GetScriptReferences 方法时，请注意以下准则:-脚本具有相同的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>属性，将删除重复项。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Script references with the same <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> are not removed as duplicates at design time.
trans-unit.target: -脚本具有相同的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>在设计时不删除重复项作为。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, they are removed as duplicates at run time.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它们会为重复的记录在运行时。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method is used to return a fully qualified URL for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> property of script references.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>方法用于返回的完全限定的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A>脚本引用的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The script references in the returned collection are cloned versions of the original script references and therefore cannot be modified in designer code by using this collection.
trans-unit.target: 的返回的集合中脚本引用克隆版本的原始脚本引用，并因此无法修改设计器代码中使用此集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control that is associated with the Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref>与 Web 页关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls associated with the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"> </xref> Web 页关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 只读集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: scriptManager is .
trans-unit.target: scriptManageris .

trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref>与 Web 页关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 只读集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: scriptManager is .
trans-unit.target: scriptManageris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> component that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
